key.name: app-workspace-bindings
key.summary: Array of application ID's and their workspace indexes

key.name: switch-workspace-on-maximize
key.summary: Whether to switch to another workspace when a window is being maximized

key.name: return-workspace-on-empty
key.summary: Whether to switch to previous workspace when the current becomes empty

key.name: snap-to-bottom
key.summary: Allow dragging a window to the bottom of the screen to open the multitasking view with it selected

key.name: plugin-loaded
key.description: This property indicates a one-time setting where the plugin is not loaded after the user installed the app

key.name: show-snap-bottom
key.summary: Whether the snap to bottom option is shown in the application

key.name: window-x
key.description: The x axis of window position

key.name: window-y
key.description: The y axis of window position
